channel.title: Salvia
channel.description:
So I've found a good source of Salvia leaves (25g for ~£7) and I'm considering weather to get it.
My plan is to make a joint with a friend with ~1g of crushed salvia and the rest baccy. I know it probably won't be much, but I just want to try a small amount at first (Not too trippy), then move onto extracts after the 25g's gone.
Thoughts? I've heard it produces really terrible trips. I just really want to have something cheap that I can have as a substitute for other things that are unavailable at the moment.

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“omfg-its-santa, post:30, topic:329481”][quote author=jme link=topic=425867.msg3278845#msg3278845 date=1279744568]

i thought salvia was fucked up the first time i took it then about 3 months later i tried some - 5-MeO-Dimethyltryptamine DMT for short, the most powerful hallucinegen in the world. this shit is what is produced in your brain when you sleep. this is the dream chemical, it is also flooded into your body when you fucking die.

protip: don’t listen to joe rogan
[/quote]
didnt get that from joe rogan? i dont even know who joe rogan is… what i said was a fact. lol it is the dream checmical…[/quote]

It’s not a fact. It’s speculation, with no scientific testing.

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @omfg-its-santa omfg-its-santa
item.description:
@omfg-its-santa wrote:

i thought salvia was fucked up the first time i took it then about 3 months later i tried some - 5-MeO-Dimethyltryptamine DMT for short, the most powerful hallucinegen in the world. this shit is what is produced in your brain when you sleep. this is the dream chemical, it is also flooded into your body when you fucking die. it sends you to another fucking dimension and i dont mean it feels like it, i mean it actually does. you see geometrical patterns moving in sychronyzed motions then you see arteries pumping but not with blood with fucking light pulsating through them. then i saw this weird energy or shape of like a shaman but had no outline or anything communicating with me and hes trying to tell me not to give into astonishment. and just thinking about that there is two realities wake reality and dream reality and what if dream reality is more real than wake reality.

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Uriko:

spice has other things than just JWH correct? I’m wondering where I can find some JWH-018 extract in canada

cant remember what else spice has in it off the top of my head, but i think youre right.

jwh-018 isnt really an extract, its synthesised, dosen’t occur in nature afaik (well, its listed as endegenous on wikipedia, so there might be some in us… but i doubt anyones extracting it from humans :P)

as for where to buy it… try searching google for its CAS # and a site with “mg” in the url

im not very good at masking sources :{

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Yer, I paid $25USD/3.5g But that was because it was a pretty weak extract, like x15 or x20. A good alternative to weed, imo, is Spice. People say it doesn’t do anything major, and they’re right, for veteran smokers. But I’m assuming you’re still a bit wet behind the ears. Spice is a wonderful incense if you ask me. Smells good, smokes smooooooth and produces effects similar to weed.

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:13, topic:329481”][quote author=chri5 link=topic=425867.msg3129074#msg3129074 date=1266276236]

Salvia isn’t even fun… Tastes like shit too

Oooh I thought it was too good to be true, so cheap!

Anyone know of anything I can legally buy (UK) that’s like bud? No supply here, and the price has SHOT up.
[/quote][quote author=Elijah link=topic=425867.msg3128763#msg3128763 date=1266254570]
I can’t remember what extract I did my first time, it was called purple haze, pretty amazing.
[/quote][quote author=TR3V0R link=topic=425867.msg3128269#msg3128269 date=1266201362]
I did it and liked it, not something that you do everyday though. It only last about 15 minutes, maybe faint effects up 30 minutes.
[/quote]you just completely disregarded two positive posts about it, or what? ugay?

my opinion, it doesn’t taste like shit, it tastes/smells like green tea, and it’s a mind blowing experience

if you’re looking for an alternative to weed then steer away from salvia because it’s completely different, just because you smoke both doesn’t mean both will have the same effects.

anyway, an alternative to bud that’s legal? naaa…

i can definitely assure u there is supply in the UK…[/quote]
Yeah, I know weed and salvia is completely different, I stumbled across it when me and a friend were going to do some bud, but she couldn’t get any, and neither could I. The only place we could find was some guy selling some for a LOT more than usual, so we’re trying to find some other shit to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just get an extract. A bad trip on salvia is like waking up after a bad dream.

The whole point of salvia is to get fucked and go to new worlds. It’s not exactly a pleasant high so I don’t know why you would smoke it for any other reason.

If smoking a non-extract in a joint has any effect, it will only be a weird/annoying buzz while smoking it. It also tastes like shit.

Get a bong, 20x extract, and hold the flame on it the entire time, then hold ur hits in for 30 seconds. Repeat until you don’t even know who you are and let your mind explore

edit: too many drug threads. 18+ section pls

Read full topic
